document.id: Pueblo de San Ildefonso Council Res. No. SI-R20-024
document.heading: PUEBLO DE SAN ILDEFONSO COUNCIL RESOLUTION NO. SI-R20-024
Extension of Grant Application and Authorization Act of 2018
document.preamble: At a duly called meeting of the Council of San Ildefonso Pueblo on the 24th day of November, 2020, the following law was adopted:

recital.text: the Pueblo de San Ildefonso Tribal council passed the Grant Application and Authorization Act of 2018; and,
the Act limited the time effect of the act to the Fiscal Years 2018-2019 and 2019-2020; and,
there is need for the time to be extended.
that the Council hereby extends the Grant Application and Authorization Act of 2018 to be effective for the fiscal year 2020 through the end of the fiscal year 2024.

procedural-data.text: The foregoing resolution was duly voted upon by the Council on November 24, 2020, at a meeting with a vote of 9 in favor, 0 opposed, 0 abstaining and 1 absent (Governor presiding and not voting) pursuant to the authority vested in the Council by the Agreement of the Pueblo de San Ildefonso.
DELIVERY OF THE RESOLUTION TO THE GOVERNOR:

Resolution No. SI-R20-024 was presented to the Governor of the Pueblo de San Ildefonso on the 25th day of November, 2020, pursuant to the Governing document of the Pueblo de San Ildefonso ("Agreement"), GOVERNOR, Sec. 4(c), and will become effective after signature by the Governor or veto override by the Council.
{ } VETO - RETURNED TO COUNCIL WITH EXPLANATION:
Presented by the Governor to the Council on the _______ day of ________________, 2020.

The foregoing resolution was duly voted upon by the Council on _________________, 2020, at a meeting with a vote of ______ in favor, _____ opposed, _____ abstaining and _____ absent (Governor presiding and not voting) pursuant to the authority vested in the Council by the Agreement of the Pueblo de San Ildefonso.

attachment.heading: EXTENSION OF GRANT APPLICATION AND AUTHORIZATION ACT OF 2018

section.heading: Short Title
section.text: This enactment shall be known as the "EXTENSION OF GRANT APPLICATION AND AUTHORIZATION ACT OF 2018".

section.heading: Purpose
section.text: The purpose of this act is to amend and extend the grant application and authorization act of 2018 to include more fiscal years than in the original act.

section.heading: Findings
section.text: The Council hereby finds and declares that:

para.text: The Pueblo de San Ildefonso Tribal council passed the Grant Application and Authorization Act of 2018; and
The act limited the time effect of the act to the Fiscal Years 2018-2019 and 2019-2020; and
There is need for the time to be extended.

section.heading: Amendment
section.text: The Council hereby extends the Grant Application and Authorization Act of 2018 to be effective for the fiscal year 2020 through the end of the fiscal year 2024.

codify:find-replace.replace: through the end of the Fiscal Year 2024;
